Text: Confederation of Indian Small Tea Growers Associations says it will not follow the Tea Board rule of paying minimum benchmark price to small tea growers/  Urges Centre to declare Rs 25 per kg as the minimum support price of green leaf produced by small tea growers.

Text: Sir we need ports with crane barges  at Dibrugarh, Jorhat, Tezpur and in Lower Assam near Guwahati and Dhubri. Without these the Brahmaputra waterway is not viable for ships to ply. If you can have just one port setup in Upper Assam we can start booking & shipping tea globally.
